title: ATS | Splits Network Platform
description: A built-in applicant tracking system designed for split-fee recruiting. Kanban pipelines, collaborative notes, interview scheduling, and automatic fee tracking — all in one platform.
author: Splits Network

blocks.subtitle: Generic applicant tracking systems were designed for internal HR teams. Splits Network's ATS is built for the split-fee model — where multiple recruiters work a role, candidates have multiple advocates, and every submission carries financial weight.
blocks.imageAlt: Kanban pipeline view showing candidate stages across multiple active roles

blocks.heading: Why Generic ATS Tools Fall Short
paragraphs: Most ATS platforms assume a single hiring team owns every candidate. In split-fee recruiting, that assumption breaks immediately. Candidates are represented by external recruiters. Submissions come from multiple sources. Fee terms vary by role and recruiter.

Splits Network's ATS understands this model natively. Every candidate record tracks who submitted them, what fee terms apply, which stage they're in, and who needs to take action next. No retrofitting required.

blocks.heading: Kanban That Reflects How You Actually Hire
paragraphs: Configure your pipeline stages to match your actual hiring process — not a generic template. Move candidates through stages with one click, trigger automated notifications, and keep every stakeholder aligned.

items.title: Drag-and-Drop Stages
items.body: Advance candidates through your pipeline visually. Stage changes automatically notify the submitting recruiter and update the timeline record.

items.title: Configurable Workflows
items.body: Define the stages that match your process: application review, screening, technical interview, final round, offer. Add as many stages as the role requires.

items.title: Role-Level Permissions
items.body: Hiring managers see candidates for their roles. Recruiters see the candidates they submitted. Privacy controls ensure the right people see the right information.

blocks.imageAlt: Kanban view of active candidate pipeline showing stages from submission to offer

blocks.heading: Every Tool You Need, Nothing You Don't

items.title: Candidate Profiles
items.description: Rich profiles with resume parsing, skills extraction, work history, and all submission and communication history in one record.

items.title: Interview Scheduling
items.description: Coordinate interviews directly in the platform. Send calendar invites, track confirmations, and log feedback without leaving the pipeline.

items.title: Collaborative Notes
items.description: Hiring managers and recruiters can leave notes on candidate records. Context is shared, decisions are documented, and nothing gets lost in email.

items.title: One-Click Submission
items.description: Recruiters submit candidates from their talent pool directly to a role. Fee terms are attached automatically based on the role's split structure.

items.title: Resume Management
items.description: Store, version, and share candidate resumes within the platform. No more attaching files to emails or losing track of which version was submitted.

items.title: Full Audit Trail
items.description: Every stage change, note, submission, and decision is timestamped and logged. Complete accountability for every candidate's journey.

blocks.quote: We replaced three separate tools — a spreadsheet tracker, a shared inbox, and a legacy ATS — with Splits Network. The built-in ATS handles everything those tools did and understands the split-fee context they never could.

cards.title: Hiring Companies
cards.description: See every candidate submitted for your roles, their current stage, and the recruiter who submitted them. Advance, reject, or request more information from one view.

cards.title: Recruiters
cards.description: Track every candidate you've submitted across all active roles. Know exactly where they stand and what action is needed without chasing hiring managers for updates.

cards.title: Recruiting Teams
cards.description: Manage your entire team's candidate pipeline in one place. Assign candidates to team members, review activity, and prevent duplicate submissions.

items.question: Can I import candidates from an existing ATS?
items.answer: Yes. Splits Network supports CSV import for candidate records, and our Enterprise plan includes direct integration with major ATS platforms including Greenhouse, Lever, and Workday.

items.question: How many pipeline stages can I create?
items.answer: Unlimited. Configure as many stages as your hiring process requires. Stages can be created, renamed, and reordered at any time without affecting existing candidate records.

items.question: Can multiple recruiters work the same role without seeing each other's candidates?
items.answer: Yes. Each recruiter only sees the candidates they submitted unless a hiring manager explicitly shares a record. Competing recruiters working the same role maintain full candidate confidentiality.

items.question: Does the ATS connect to the billing system?
items.answer: Directly. When a candidate is moved to the hired stage, the placement fee is calculated automatically based on the role's fee structure and split terms. No manual invoice creation required.

blocks.heading: Run Your Pipeline From One Place
blocks.subtitle: The ATS is built in. No integration required, no separate subscription, no migration project.
